CmdLine: apk update   && mkdir -p /usr/share/man/man1   && apk add git   && apk add ca-certificates   && apk add openssh   && apk add bash   && apk add sudo   && apk add shadow   && apk add coreutils   && apk add findutils   && apk add make   && apk add curl   && apk add tar   && apk add gzip   && apk add unzip   && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*   && mkdir -p /var/mail   && groupadd --gid 3434 user   && useradd --uid 3434 --gid user --shell /bin/bash --create-home user   && echo 'user ALL=NOPASSWD: ALL' >> /etc/sudoers.d/50-user   && echo 'Defaults    env_keep += "DEBIAN_FRONTEND"' >> /etc/sudoers.d/env_keep
Commands.Name: run
